attributes.action: Regain a controlling Share in AWE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British Nuclear Deterrent is now under the control of private contractors, whether you are Pro or Anti Deterrent the only way to properly manage the deterrent is have a full governmental over site, which can no longer be possiable.
We must regain control as a matter of National Security if nothing else
